Texts.Chs: 把^orange;黑色玻璃^reset;带给这名科学家。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Black Glass^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 你有^orange;冶炼炉^reset;吧？如果有的话，请试着熔炼^orange;黑曜石^reset;并把产物给我。我会很感激你协助。
Texts.Eng: Do you have a ^orange;Blast Furnace^reset; yet? If so, try to smelt ^orange;Obsidian^reset; and bring me the results. I will be most grateful for your assistance.
